DOC.brief_summary: To assess the effect of music during colposcopy on womenÂ´s anxiety.
DOC.brief_title: Music and Colposcopy in Women With Cervical Dysplasia.
DOC.criteria: women referred for colposcopy due to cervical abnormalities We included women if they attended colposcopy for the first time pregnant women presence of a language barrier known anxiety disorder or depression history of conization or other treatments on the cervix uteri known oncological disorder auditory defect cardiovascular disease inadequate colposcopy
